S

server - package server
Provides the classes necessary to represent any hippodrome region on the server side of the execution.
ServerConfigurations - Class in configurations
Definition of the configurations for the hippodrome regions (also known as server).
ServerConfigurations() - Constructor for class configurations.ServerConfigurations
 
ServerLauncher - Class in server
Main function which must be used to run the various entities classified on entities.
ServerLauncher() - Constructor for class server.ServerLauncher
 
ServerRegisterRemoteObject - Class in registry
This data type instantiates and registers a remote object that enables the registration of other remote objects located in the same or other processing nodes in the local registry service.
ServerRegisterRemoteObject() - Constructor for class registry.ServerRegisterRemoteObject

summonHorsesToPaddock() - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Changes the state of the Entities to Announcing Next Race (ANR) and waits till the last ControlCentre.goCheckHorses() from the last Spectator to arrive on Paddock.
summonHorsesToPaddock() - Method in interface hippodrome.ControlCentreInterface
 
summonHorsesToPaddock(int) - Method in class hippodrome.Stable
